p: Determination of MIC. Antibacterial‎‎ efficiency of EOs was quantified by the MIC method ( Table 3). All tested bacterial strains were susceptible to four EOs. The MIC of four EOs for all of the tested bacteria was in the range of 0.64 - 40.96 mg mL -1. The ZEO showed strong antibacterial ‎ ‎‎activities at MIC ≤ 1.28 mg mL -1. The MIC of ZEO for all of the bacteria was minimized. The bacterial growth was also inhibited by OEO at MIC ≤ 2.56 mg mL -1. There were no differences between the antibacterial ‎ ‎‎activity of ZEO and OEO ( p ≥ 0.05).
